options.name: -b
tip: count using bytes rather than columns
(meaning control characters such as newline are not treated specially)

options.name: -s
options.tip: break lines at word boundaries rather than a hard cut-off

options.name: -w
tip: set WIDTH as the maximum line width rather than 80

description: Writes each file (or standard input if no files are given) to standard output whilst breaking long lines.
